description: Example snippet demonstrating how to create a Note, map to DB/JSON, and render a human-friendly timestamp. This file is for developer reference and not used at runtime.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model class representing a note with attributes such as title, content, timestamps, and pinned status.

methods.name: exampleUsage
methods.description: Creates a Note instance, demonstrates mapping to database and JSON, and shows a relative timestamp.
